Whanos-DocumentationÔÉÅ

Mastering individual DevOps notions and technologies is a good thing, and it is even better mas- tering them in combination with each other. This is what this project is about: we will have to combine our knowledge of the four technologies previously seen to set up an infrastructure using all of them.
